description: Try our easy to follow Pumpkin, Feta & Spinach Ravioli recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta,Quick & easy dinner,Low saturated fat,High fibre,High protein,Roast,Seafood free,Pumpkin,Low sugar,Spinach
name: Pumpkin, Feta & Spinach Ravioli Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Cut pumpkin into 2cm cubes and place onto tray. Spray with olive oil. Sprinkle with Italian seasoning, salt and pepper. Roast for 20 minutes or until tender.
Meanwhile, cook ravioli as per packet instructions. Drain, reserving cup of the cooking water. Return to saucepan with reserved water. Add spinach leaves and toss until just wilted.
Spoon into bowls. Top with feta and walnuts, if using.
